block.p: BARRON-Jeannette. The Board of Directors and staff of UJA-Federation of New York note with sadness the passing of Jeannette Barron, beloved mother of Froma Benerofe, and mother-in-law of Andrew Benerofe. Froma's many organizational positions include current Chair of the Westchester Program Services Cabinet, member of the UJA-Federation of New York Board of Directors and past President of Westchester Jewish Community Services. Andrew is a member of the UJA-Federation Board of Directors and serves on the Commission on Jewish Identity and Renewal. The Benerofe family are outstanding supporters and cherished friends who are devoted to maintaining a strong and vital Jewish community through their extraordinary generosity and compassionate commitment. Judith Stern Peck, Board Chair James S. Tisch, President Martine Fleishman, Chair, Westchester Women's Campaign Barry J. Effron, Chair, Westchester General Campaign Bernie Kimberg, Westchester Regional Director John S. Ruskay, Exec VP & CEO

BARRON-Jeannette. The Board of Directors and staff of UJA-Federation of New York note with sadness the passing of Jeannette Barron, beloved mother of Froma Benerofe, and mother-in-law of Andrew Benerofe. Froma's many organizational positions include current Chair of the Westchester Program Services Cabinet, member of the UJA-Federation of New York Board of Directors and past President of Westchester Jewish Community Services. Andrew is a member of the UJA-Federation Board of Directors and serves on the Commission on Jewish Identity and Renewal. The Benerofe family are outstanding supporters and cherished friends who are devoted to maintaining a strong and vital Jewish community through their extraordinary generosity and compassionate commitment. Judith Stern Peck, Board Chair James S. Tisch, President Martine Fleishman, Chair, Westchester Women's Campaign Barry J. Effron, Chair, Westchester General Campaign Bernie Kimberg, Westchester Regional Director John S. Ruskay, Exec VP & CEO
